title: 강조 도치
description: 강조 도치을 연습합니다. EMPHASIS-INVERSION 패턴을 활용하여 고급 영어 표현을 익힙니다.
examples: Only then did I realize my mistake.
Only after arriving home did I realize I had lost my keys.
Only by studying hard can you succeed.
learning_points: inversion 관련 고급 표현과 실용적 활용

sentences.en: Only then did I realize my mistake.

sentences.kr: 집에 도착한 후에야 열쇠를 잃어버린 것을 알았습니다.
sentences.en: Only after arriving home did I realize I had lost my keys.
Only by studying hard can you succeed.
Only then did we understand the seriousness of the problem.

sentences.kr: 팀워크를 통해서만 목표를 달성할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Only through teamwork can we achieve our goals.

sentences.kr: 모든 정보를 얻은 후에야 결정을 내렸습니다.
sentences.en: Only after getting all the information did I make a decision.

sentences.kr: 경험을 통해서만 진정한 지혜를 얻을 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Only through experience can one gain true wisdom.
Only at that moment did I learn the truth.
